title: DevSecOps & Cloud Intern
description: Internship Scholarship Program at Compass.uol in the Cloud area with a focus on AWS and DevSecOps, covering the entire foundation and tools used.
content: Study and application of agile methodologies (Scrum) in project management
Exploration of security practices for applications and adoption of best standards
Hands-on experience with the AWS (Amazon Web Services) cloud platform
Understanding and use of containers in production environments
Creation and maintenance of Shell and Bash scripts for automated tasks
Monitoring and visualization of system metrics with Prometheus and Grafana
Configuration and management of containers with Docker and Kubernetes
